home.title: Home

presentation.title: Hi, I'm Antoine
presentation.subtitle: Full-stack and mobile developer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional applications

home.welcome-to-my-portfolio:
Welcome to my portfolio!
Here you will be able to learn more about me and my projects.

about-me.title: About me
about-me.description: I am currently a 5th year student at Epitech and I am passionate about software development. I have experience in a wide range of technologies and programming languages, and I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: If you are interested in seeing some of my work, you can check out my projects below. I have worked on a variety of projects, including web applications, mobile applications, and games. I am always looking for new projects to work on, so if you have an idea for a project, feel free to reach out to me.
